resources.string: INT Post-Armageddon: fighting for your survival

2013: the world was overhelmed by the Armageddon in late 2012. Sole survivors in a post-apocalyptic land, your mission is simple: stay alive. But one hope remains: find the Stargate to escape this world. Rumors say that the Stargate may be found on the campus of an Engineering School, Telecom SudParis. You must find it so you can leave this no-man land...
